metadata.title: ALDC Data Ecosystem
metadata.description: Complete data lineage from source systems through transformations to consumption layers - Zeus Memory, Eclipse Pipeline, AI APIs, and client data models
metadata.source: ALDC Data Mapping Project - Research Phase

nodes.label: ALDC Data Hub
nodes.title: Central data orchestration hub - Zeus Memory Federation, Eclipse Pipeline, and AI Intelligence layer

nodes.label: Nextcloud
nodes.title: Nextcloud file storage - 110+ files from J5 directory, supports PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD, XLS formats

nodes.label: Avoma
nodes.title: Meeting transcripts and AI-generated notes - speaker-by-speaker dialogue with timestamps

nodes.label: Email Systems
nodes.title: Email ingestion service - customer communication and internal correspondence

nodes.label: Web Scraper
nodes.title: AI blogs, documentation, RSS feeds - batch processing with Voyage embeddings

nodes.label: Slack
nodes.title: Slack message archival - thread mapping, presence tracking, webhook delivery

nodes.label: Jira/Confluence
nodes.title: Atlassian integration - issue tracking and documentation via AtlassianClient

nodes.label: Google Ads
nodes.title: Google Ads API via Windsor AI - campaigns, impressions, conversions, video metrics

nodes.label: Meta/Facebook
nodes.title: Meta Ads - 12 templates for ad set insights, campaign performance across clients

nodes.label: Amazon Seller
nodes.title: Amazon Seller Central - orders, inventory, FBA returns, listings, sales reports

nodes.label: SellerCloud
nodes.title: SellerCloud REST + SQL - orders, inventory, products, RMA, vendors (14 templates)

nodes.label: Salesforce
nodes.title: CRM data - customer relationships, opportunities, activities

nodes.label: Smartsheet
nodes.title: Budget planning spreadsheets - flight management, spend tracking

nodes.label: Trade Desk
nodes.title: Trade Desk reporting - performance reports, unique impression tracking

nodes.label: Viant DSP
nodes.title: Viant DSP - campaign performance, ROAS, reach frequency metrics

nodes.label: LinkedIn Ads
nodes.title: LinkedIn advertising - video social, professional audience targeting

nodes.label: Zeus Ingestion
nodes.title: BaseIngestionService - connection pooling, deduplication via external_id + content_hash, batch processing (100-item)

nodes.label: Eclipse Connectors
nodes.title: 143 Eclipse templates across ALDC/F92/GEP - CSV, REST API, SQL Server, Snowflake connectors

nodes.label: quickstart-api
nodes.title: Python API client for ALDC Analytics Labs platform - dataset querying, field filtering, measure calculations

nodes.label: Avoma Ingestion
nodes.title: Full Avoma ingestion (926 lines) - transcripts, AI notes, action items, rate limiting with backoff

nodes.label: Nextcloud J5 Scanner
nodes.title: Production cron job - periodic scanning of 110+ files from J5 shared directory

nodes.label: Voyage Batch Embedder
nodes.title: Voyage-3 batch embeddings (1024-dim) - 33% cost savings, 1000 items/batch, async processing at 2 AM UTC

nodes.label: Eclipse ETL
nodes.title: Template-based extraction - partition schemes, merge strategies (insert/add/upsert), TTL management

nodes.label: Quality Scorer
nodes.title: Content quality assessment - confidence scores, deduplication, metadata enrichment

nodes.label: Entity Extractor
nodes.title: Business entity extraction - vendors, products, channels, metrics, time periods with schema mapping

nodes.label: dbt Pipelines
nodes.title: Snowflake transformations - warehouse views, dimension tables, fact tables, scheduled tasks

nodes.label: Leiden Clustering
nodes.title: Memory clustering - k-NN graph (k=15), 385 L2 domains, 3,264 L1 topics, 50K+ memories

nodes.label: PostgreSQL (Zeus)
nodes.title: Zeus core database - 3.6M+ memories, pgvector embeddings (1024-dim), GIN text search, HNSW indexes

nodes.label: Snowflake Warehouse
nodes.title: Cloud data warehouse - ALDC_ENG, FUSION_92, GEP schemas, star schema models, 89+ warehouse files

nodes.label: Cosmos DB
nodes.title: Eclipse configuration - task connections, LLM message trails, conversation storage

nodes.label: Redis Cache
nodes.title: Query result caching - 60-second TTL stats cache, semantic similarity cache (40-60% hit rate)

nodes.label: Embedding Queue
nodes.title: Async processing queue - pending/processing/completed status tracking, batch audit trail

nodes.label: Anthropic Claude
nodes.title: claude-sonnet-4-20250514 - business insights, SQL generation, meeting analysis, max 4096 tokens

nodes.label: Voyage AI
nodes.title: voyage-3.5 embeddings - 1024 dimensions, 2000 RPM, 8M TPM, batch API for cost optimization

nodes.label: OpenAI GPT
nodes.title: gpt-3.5-turbo-16k - SQL generation, Assistants API, schema context for Snowflake queries

nodes.label: BGE Embeddings
nodes.title: BGE-M3 alternative embeddings - 1024 dimensions, local deployment option

nodes.label: LangChain Agent
nodes.title: HybridEclipseAgent - tool calling, conversation history, data cache, context compression

nodes.label: Voyage Rerank
nodes.title: voyage-rerank-2 - cross-encoder reranking, +13.89% accuracy improvement, ~14ms additional latency

nodes.label: Zeus Memory API
nodes.title: FastAPI server (21,039 lines) - /api/store, /api/search, /api/memory, hybrid search (125ms latency)

nodes.label: Eclipse API
nodes.title: Data analytics API - dataset queries, field/measure selection, row/column/array formats

nodes.label: Athena API
nodes.title: Progressive loading API - /api/overview, /api/l2/{id}, /api/l1/{id}, semantic zoom endpoints

nodes.label: MCP Server
nodes.title: 17 MCP tools - remember, search, recall, create_task, record_decision, notion_sync

nodes.label: OAuth Azure AD
nodes.title: Azure Entra ID integration - /authorize, /callback, /token, user impersonation

nodes.label: Athena Visualization
nodes.title: 3D force graphs - 7 visualizations, 2,480-line generator, radial/force/spherical layouts

nodes.label: Atlas Workspace
nodes.title: Document workspace - semantic zoom, Sigma.js 2D graphs, markdown editor, Zeus Console

nodes.label: Eclipse Chat
nodes.title: Natural language analytics - query classification, multi-step orchestration, visualization engine

nodes.label: Power BI Dashboards
nodes.title: Client reporting - data model integration, capacity provider, workspace impersonation

nodes.label: Claude Code
nodes.title: CCE development - @remember, @search commands, Zeus MCP integration, project management

nodes.label: Slack Webhooks
nodes.title: Team notifications - alerts for F92, Navira, task assignments, status updates

nodes.label: Fusion92
nodes.title: 47 Eclipse templates, 37 Snowflake files, 12 connections - Google/Meta/LinkedIn/Trade Desk/Viant advertising

nodes.label: GEP/Navira
nodes.title: 61 Eclipse templates, 43 Snowflake files, 15 connections - Amazon, SellerCloud e-commerce

nodes.label: ALDC Engineering
nodes.title: 35 Eclipse templates, 9 Snowflake files, 5 connections - internal operations monitoring
